titleStmt.title: A patterne for all, especially for noble and honourable persons, to teach them how to die nobly and honourably. Delivered in a sermon preached at the solemne interment of the corps of the Right Honourable Robert Earle of Warwick. Who aged 70 years 11. months, died April 19. And was honorably buried, May 1. 1658. at Felsted in Essex. By Edmund Calamy B.D. and pastor of the church at Aldermanbury.
titleStmt.author: Calamy, Edmund, 1600-1666.

publicationStmt.publisher: printed for Edward Brewster, at the Crane in Pauls Church-yard.,

notesStmt.note: Title page in two states: line 12 reads (1) "who aged [blank] died April 19. And was" or (2) "who aged 70 years 11. months, died April 19. and". State 1 "[blank]" indicates a space left for the age to be inserted; "70" is inserted in MS. in Thomason copy.
Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
